options.name: Unarmored Fighting
options.description: Gain +1 Dodge and +1 Block while not wearing armor

options.name: Hardened Skin
options.description: Gain +1 Physical Mitigation while not wearing armor

options.name: Peak Performance
options.description: Gain +1 Acrobatics, +1 Athletics and +1 Physical Mitigation while not wearing armor

options.name: Tough Hide
options.description: Gain +1 Physical and Elemental Mitigation while not wearing armor

options.name: Action : Sprint
options.description: You move a distance equal to double your Movement Speed. While sprinting in this way, you gain +2 Block and Dodge against any provoked Reactions.

options.name: Ray Avoidance
options.description: You can use your Dodge Skill to attempt to avoid Rays instead of Resistance.

options.name: Unarmored Expert
options.description: Gain +1 Dodge, +1 Resist and +1 Block while not wearing armor. Additionally, gain +1 Movement Speed.

options.name: Reaction : Rollout
options.description: In response to being Targeted by an Area, Line or Cone ability, you can immediately move up to 2 Units. If you are no longer within the Area, you automatically succeed on the Defense Check and avoid any Splash Damage, otherwise you gain a +3 Bonus to your Check.

options.name: Free Action : Unencumbered Attack
options.description: You make an Attack with a Light or Ultra Light Weapon as a Free Action while not wearing Armor.

options.name: Magical Skin
options.description: Gain +2 Dark, Divine and Elemental Mitigation

options.name: Action : Tactical Retreat
options.description: Make an Attack with a Melee Weapon. Regardless if the Attack hits or misses, you can move 3 Units without provoking Reactions. If the Attack is a True Hit, you can move up to your Movement Speed

options.name: Reaction : Versatile Reaction
options.description: You can use one of your unique Reactions without expending one of its charges.

options.name: Master of Body
options.description: Gain +1 Dodge, Block and Resist while not wearing Armor. Additionally, gain +1 Movement Speed, +1 Physical Mitigation and +1 Elemental Mitigation.
